name: TRIXMEDIA Inc
description:
TRIXMEDIA Inc is a digital design agency based in Los Angeles. They create brand strategies, logos, graphics, web designs, and packaging for a variety of clients. With over 10 years of experience, they deliver award-winning custom websites using the latest technology and trends. The team is guaranteed to deliver a responsive and reliable website that accomplishes all of your business needs.
They’re also skilled e-commerce developers. Using their own software called “Goozga”, the team can seamlessly transfer clients to an online sales platform.
